titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Rudolph H. Kampmeier, A.B., M.D. Papers

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

repository.corpname: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

did.unittitle: Rudolph H. Kampmeier, A.B., M.D. Papers

scopecontent.p: The materials in the Rudolph H. Kampmeier Collection are arranged in alphabetical order. For economy codes were used to represent cities NY = New York, LA = Los Angelos, N = Nashville, C = Chicago, SL = St. Louis. Brackets were used when a location was not positively known.
